title: Design and Operation of a Virtual Remote Collaboration-Based STEM Laboratory

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational STEM knowledge and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Strengthening adult learners' experimental design and operational competencies in virtual remote lab environments collaborating across two or more institutions

learning_goals: Learners can design and simulate three or more STEM experiment procedures using virtual remote collaboration tools.
Learners can solve experimental problems by applying real-time collaboration strategies among remote participants in a distributed lab environment.
Learners can systematically manage the entire process—from experiment design to documentation—using digital project management tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
